title: Economic Advantage of College
description: Since the Great Recession began in 2008 many college graduates and their families have been wondering: what good is an […]
contentencoded:
Since the Great Recession began in 2008 many college graduates and their families have been wondering: what good is an education if you can’t get a job? A new report finds that even though the job market is still weak, it’s much better for college graduates than for those with just a high school degree.


Guest: Anthony P. Carnevale, Director and Research Professor of the Georgetown University Center on Education and the Workforce


Read the report, “The College Advantage: Weathering the Economic Storm.”
